Suppose we wish to maximize f(x_1, x_2) = {{objectivefunction}} subject to:
\begin{array}{rcl} {{row1}} & \leq & {{b1}} \\ {{row2}} & \leq & {{b2}} \\ {{row3}} & \leq & {{b3}} \\ {{row4}} & \leq & {{b4}} \\ \end{array}
Encode this noncanonical problem in a tableau and use pivots to convert the problem into a canonical problem.
